feed.title: Enclosed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.4.0
entry.content:
File sharing is out! :tada:

What's Changed

  • The env variable NOTES_MAX_ENCRYPTED_CONTENT_LENGTH has been renamed NOTES_MAX_ENCRYPTED_PAYLOAD_LENGTH
  • Error 413 when note too big now has code note.payload_too_large instead of note.content_too_large
  • Database format has changed (content field become payload)

Commits details : * chore(deps): update dependency @cloudflare/workers-types to v4.20240903.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/85 * fix(deps): update dependency unstorage to v1.11.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/86 * fix(deps): update dependency unstorage to v1.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/92 * chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.75.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/91 * fix(deps): update dependency @inquirer/prompts to v5.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/94 * chore(deps): update dependency eslint to v9.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/93 * chore(deps): update dependency @iconify-json/tabler to v1.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/96 * feat(notes): share file assets by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/95 * fix(deps): update dependency hono to v4.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/104 * chore(deps): update dependency @iconify-json/tabler to v1.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/102 * feat(deploy-cloudflare): fail build at first issue by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/108 * fix(deps): update dependency @corentinth/chisels to v1.0.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/107 * chore(deps): update dependency tsx to v4.19.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/106 * chore(deps): update dependency @cloudflare/workers-types to v4.20240909.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/100 * chore(deps): update dependency zx to v8.1.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/105 * chore(deps): update dependency vite to v5.4.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/103 * chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.76.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/101 * chore(deps): update dependency eslint to v9.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/110 * fix(deps): update dependency hono to v4.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/109 * chore(deps): update pnpm to v9.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/97 * fix(deps): update dependency figue to v2.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/99

[!WARNING] The database format is not compatible with the previous versions

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.3.2...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs(versioning): added page telling about monorepo versioning by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/118
  • chore(deps): update dependency zx to v8.1.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/115
  • chore(deps): update dependency @cloudflare/workers-types to v4.20240909.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/116
  • feat(footer): added version number in footer by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/119
  • fix(deps): update dependency hono to v4.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/121
  • feat(docker): root image by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v0.1.0...v1.5.1

  • chore(deps): update dependency zx to v8.1.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/115
  • chore(deps): update dependency @cloudflare/workers-types to v4.20240909.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/116
  • feat(footer): added version number in footer by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/119
  • fix(deps): update dependency hono to v4.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/121

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.6.0
entry.content:
:arrow_forward: Simple login/password authentication is now available!

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update vitest monorepo to v2.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/120
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.76.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/117
  • feat(docs): added troubleshooting section by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/123
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.77.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/124
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v5.6.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/98
  • chore(deps): update dependency @antfu/eslint-config to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/58
  • chore(github): added contributing.md by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/131
  • feat(index): added canonical url by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/132
  • refactor(docker-compose): remove version from docker-compose.yml by @Zoobdude in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/133
  • refactor(docker-compose): only one docker compose to rule them all by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/134
  • chore(deps): update vitest monorepo to v2.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/135
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v5.4.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/128
  • fix(files): extract files assets when note has password by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/140
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.78.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/136
  • fix(deps): update dependency @solidjs/router to v0.14.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/137
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v22.5.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/138
  • chore(deps): update dependency wrangler to v3.78.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/141
  • docs(readme): improved header by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/142
  • feat(auth): add authentication mecanism by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/129
  • chore(docs): added lint by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/144

New Contributors

  • @Zoobdude made their first contribution in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/133

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.5.1...v1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Enclosed: v1.6.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor(docs): configuration variables as table by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/214
  • feat(i18n): setup crowdin integration by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/215
  • chore(deps): update dependency jsdom to v25.0.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/213
  • chore(actions): added stale action by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/217
  • chore(deps): update dependency esbuild to ^0.24.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/212
  • fix(layout) Adjust new note button on mobile by @Zoobdude in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/182
  • refactor(responsive): increased navbar mobile breakpoint by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/225
  • fix(note-viewer): preserve line breaks by @CorentinTh in https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/pull/229

Full Changelog: https://github.com/CorentinTh/enclosed/compare/v1.6.8...v1.6.9
